price: Dan tidaklah Tuhan yang menciptakan langit dan bumi itu berkuasa menciptakan kembali jasad-jasad mereka yang telah hancur? Benar, Dia berkuasa.  Dan Dia-lah Maha Pencipta lagi Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalaysa alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin ʿalā an yakhluqa mith'lahum balā wahuwa al-khalāqu al-ʿalīmu
